desc: Your dog deserves the very best in nutrition, flavor, and variety. That’s why Canine Cravers offers your pet freshly made treats that will have your pup begging for more. With no hidden ingredients, these unique treats are locally sourced & prepared and veterinarian approved too. Whether teaching an old dog new tricks

layout.text: Canine Cravers: Our first ingredient is our only ingredient.
We source all natural, human grade, gourmet quality, grain free treats directly from Alaska & Canada. #cureforthecrave.
